attributes.action: Stop David Jason Playing Rincewind in The Colour of Magic Adaptation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Jason is a great actor but he does not, in any way shape or form, suit the part of Rincewind from Terry Pratchett's Discworld novels - a part that he has been given in an upcoming movie adaptation.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
